title: Complete dashboard SDK integration (validation, variables, panel addition)
description: SDK INTEGRATION INCOMPLETE: Three TODOs in dashboard SDK: (1) builder_sdk.py:660 _validate_panels() returns all panels without validation, (2) sdk_adapter.py:460 add_template_variables() skips variable addition, (3) sdk_adapter.py:491 create_service_dashboard() creates panels but doesn't add them. These represent incomplete SDK migration work.
